title: Eritrea
summary: Eritrea is a country in Eastern Africa. The capital is Asmara. Population: 3.6 million. Area: 117,600 km².

images.alt: The flag of Eritrea comprises three triangles — a large red isosceles triangle with its base spanning the hoist end and its apex at the midpoint on the fly end, and a green and blue right-angled triangle above and beneath the red triangle. On the hoist side of the red triangle is a golden vertical olive branch encircled by a golden olive wreath.

attribution.note: National flags are in the public domain.
